text: Life is an album by Culture Club. It was released in 2018. It was their sixth album together (apart from several greatest hits albums). == Songs == 'God and Love' 'Human Zoo', 'Let Somebody Love You', 'What Does Sorry Mean?', 'Runaway Train', 'Resting Bitch Face', 'Different Man', 'Oil and Water', 'More than Silence', and 'Life' Category:2018 albums
title: Life (Culture Club album)
